37.eng-name: The Book of Clothes and Adornment

hadiths.text: Jabir reported:I heard Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) saying during an expedition in which we also participated: Make a general practice of wearing sandals, for a man is riding as it were when he wears sandals

chapter.ara-name: بَاب اسْتِحْبَابِ لُبْسِ النِّعَالِ وَمَا فِي مَعْنَاهَا
chapter.eng-name: It Is Recommended To Wear Sandals et
